attributes.action: Ignore the anti-muslim petitions to reject mosque proposals, but withdraw public funding for religious organisations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned about the use of the e-petition facility to produce anti-muslim propaganda, such as the numerous petitions to reject mosque proposals. However I do not believe that any public funding should go towards religious facilities. The funding needed for these facilities should be raised by the religious organisations alone.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions about other petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
